format long
z1=[-0.57735026918963 0.57735026918963];
z2=[-0.77459666924148 0 0.77459666924148];
z3=[-0.86113631159405 -0.33998104358486 0.33998104358486 0.86113631159405];

w1=[1 1];
w2=[5/9 8/9 5/9];
w3=[0.34785484513475 0.65214515486255 0.65214515486255 0.34785484513475];

x1=(1+z1)/2
x2=(1+z2)/2
x3=(1+z3)/2

f(1)=sin(x3(1))/x3(1)
f(2)=sin(x3(2))/x3(2)
f(3)=sin(x3(3))/x3(3)
f(4)=sin(x3(4))/x3(4)

b=w3(1).*f(1)+w3(2).*f(2)+w3(3).*f(3)+w3(4).*f(4)
B=b/2

f1(1)=atan(z1(1))/(1+z1(1));
f1(2)=atan(z1(2))/(1+z1(2));

c1=w1(1).*f1(1)+w1(2).*f1(2);
